channel.title: I need help on how to make stuff in moparscape 3.2
channel.description: Hello i need help on how to make monsters, shops and more known stuff. i got a sever i can't eat on it i can't talk to people like npc's and i think mybe it's suppose to be like that cauz iam new and i need major help. please help me :) :confused: [ul][/ul]

item.title: I need help on how to make stuff in moparscape 3.2
item.dc:creator: @mmjack mmjack
item.description:
@mmjack wrote:

Use the NPC.cfg file to add npcs type npc id as the first number then coordsx and y as the 2nd and 3rd set of numbers But dude seriusly i wud get to grips with what i was doing before i opend a server

Read full topic
